CustomField.description: Use this option to change the border radius of choice based questions. Enter value with number and unit combination e.g: 5px or 10% etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Answer Text Border Radius allows you to specify the border radius of choice-based questions in the survey responder interface. You can enter a value with a number and unit combination to define the curvature of the border edges. For example, setting the value to 5px will create a border with a 5-pixel radius, giving it a slightly rounded appearance. Similarly, using a value of 10% will create a border with a radius equal to 10% of its width or height, resulting in a more rounded shape.
CustomField.label: Answer Text Border Radius
